name: High School Heist
description:
Welcome To High School Heist !

Controls : 

WASD - To Move 

Right Click to exit dialogue  

Goal is !

Help Your friend to collect their items and earn money by doing so before the teacher finds you or the alarm rings.

How To Play !

Go and talk to the students who have  a $ symbol above their head, see what they want and search the classroom for it and return it back to them, make sure u keep an eye on the teacher and the alarm bell! 

Good Luck & Have Fun!
